analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0x0fbe9cc858d7ad6e246fe9d01aed22abd2a66f0b.sol:
	Contract DanatCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0x0fbe9cc858d7ad6e246fe9d01aed22abd2a66f0b.sol#203-204)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

DanatCoin._rewardTokenValue should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x0fbe9cc858d7ad6e246fe9d01aed22abd2a66f0b.sol#92)
DanatCoin._rewardedTokens should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x0fbe9cc858d7ad6e246fe9d01aed22abd2a66f0b.sol#91-92)
DanatCoin.circulatedTokens should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x0fbe9cc858d7ad6e246fe9d01aed22abd2a66f0b.sol#89-91)
DanatCoin.lastBlock should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x0fbe9cc858d7ad6e246fe9d01aed22abd2a66f0b.sol#89)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0x0fbe9cc858d7ad6e246fe9d01aed22abd2a66f0b.sol:
